wikipedia_page.main:
Trevor P. Burton (born 1943) is a retired male pole vaulter who competed for England.
He represented England in the pole vault, at the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Kingston, Jamaica.
He was a member of the City of Stoke Athletic Club and was AAA National champion on three occasions.

response: Trevor Burton (born Trevor Ireson; 9 March 1949 in Aston, Birmingham, England[ AllMusic.com biography]) is an English guitarist and is a founding member of The Move.

Former Move drummer Bev Bevan had been touring as "Bev Bevan's Move" since 2004, augmented on occasion by Trevor Burton. Burton joined permanently in 2007 and the Autumn 2007 tour was billed as "The Move featuring Trevor Burton and Bev Bevan".Bev Bevan interview with Johnnie Walker, BBC Radio 2, 20 September 2007
